data.eml:eml: Keys to world Charipinae (Hymenoptera, Cynipoidea, Figitidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ferrer-Suay, Mar, elfa, Jesus, Pujade-Villar, Juli (2019): Keys to world Charipinae (Hymenoptera, Cynipoidea, Figitidae). ZooKeys 822: 79-139, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.822.30151, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.822.30151
